terms.meaning: Game development ke liye complete framework.

terms.meaning: Game objects ke beech contact detect karna.
terms.example: Player hitting wall, bullet hitting target.

Server-side logic aur database operations.

terms.example: HTTP methods GET, POST, PUT, DELETE.
